my website: www.nicolaspetit.ch, the pictures i want to sell: https://www.photo.nicolaspetit.ch/albums/portfolio/
please help!

item.title: Multi-language plugin
item.description: Hi, I wanted to share that I created a plugin that translates content in the browser - so no adaption of server-php code is necessary. You can even extend your theme to contain a language selector. Furthermore the plugin detects automatically the language of your visitor and sets automatically the apropritate language (or a fallback language if you didn't translate your page yet into the language of the visitor). Last but not least the plugin makes your browser cache the language files so that they are not refetched on every page reload (if you select to do so in the plugin settings). You can find more info about the plugin under https://cielitolindo.de/essays/2017/10/enable-multi-language-support-on-a-koken-site/

Best regards Claas

item.title: Multiple Items / Item-specific option
item.description:
Hello!
Upon purchasing and installing the Cart plugin, I am disappointed to discover that the "Cart" is not actually a shopping cart at all, but rather a method for purchase a single item. I thought that I must be doing something wrong, but a quick search reveals that in fact, the 'Cart" allows for placing only a singular item into it before check out is required to continue shopping. Additionally, it seems that there is no method of assigning item-specific options, for example, a specific print being available in several sizes, while a different print might be available in different sizes.
It should surprise no one that in most cases I prefer my customers to purchase multiple items which seem to bring in more revenue than selling a single item and frequently, in photography and fine art, the proportions of a specific image lend themselves only to specific sizes which differ somewhat from image to image.
I would like to think I;m missing something here but alas, it seems that the Cart is not a cart after all. Virtually by definition, a cart is something only required for multiple items. Please let me know when I might expect the cart to accommodate multiple items, and item-specific options and pricing. Without these seemingly very basic features, the cart seems unusable to me.
Thanks!

item.title: Image Protector is easy to bypass...
item.description:
While it prevents you from right-clicking on an image, all you need to do is right-click on any other part of the page and select "View Source."
Scroll down to the "window.theContent" area and you will see the easily readable URL for the image.
Anyone with basic HTML knowledge would be able to download the full uploaded resolution of your image.
Any plans on fixing this? I was about to purchase the plug-in but this is a bummer.

item.title: easy hotlinking
item.description:
Hi,
Since Photobucket had the brilliant idea of stopping 3rd party hosting, unless you pay them 399$ a year, I want a personal space, where I can store my photos, but can share them easily.
The Koken Gallery is working fine, uploading is easy. But I am not finding a plugin that shows me easy to copy share links, that I can use on several Forums and sites. I have searched the Plugin library, but could not find a plugin that can help me.
Ideally, the plugin will put a custom link underneath the shown photo, with the physical location, so that I can put that link in image brackets on forum. This way I will have total control over my photos and as long as I pay my own site fees, no company will thrash my forumthreads. :)
Hope there is something out there, that already has this feature, or hope someone is willing and able to make a plugin that will do exactly this. :)
Thanks in advance for the help. :)
Marc

Many thanks,
Tobias W.

item.title: Email plugin modded to solve a problem.
item.description:
Today I faced a problem with the email plugin because I misunderstood how it is supposed to work. Maybe someone else has the same problem. The email plugins when used in smtp mode setup the sender and the destination email to the same address. The problem is when you setup an account for sending email to another account you look everyday. I've edited the plugin adding an SMTP sender address used in the send process and now it works flawlessly.
in plugin.php change from: ->setFrom(array($toEmail)) to: ->setFrom(array($this->data->smtp_from_email))
and in plugin.json add: , "smtp_from_email": { "type": "string", "header": "Sender address", "info": "Set the sender address", "dependencies": { "evaluate": "all", "conditions": [ { "option": "provider", "equals": "smtp" } ] } }
That's all! Regards!

Thx lot, Thilo

item.title: Photograph not showing as Content?
item.description: I've just added a photograph to my Koken site and, while the image is appearing in its assigned album (Photography), it isn't showing up as content this a result of an upper limit to the number of images allowable to be displayed as 'content', or some other issue? http://blog.advids.co/20-video-marketing-examples-from-it-service-desk-management-software-solutions/

item.title: Rating plugin with Regale 2 theme does not work
item.description:
Hi,
I use Koken 22.18 version with Regale 2 theme and I just added Rating plugin. In Library view when I select any of photos I can see Rating section on the setting section on the right. But there is only "Times rated" in this section. There is no "Show ratings" option as shown in koken plugin page at https://store.koken.me/plugins/rating. My web site is www.ercanuc.com.
In my site, I can only see heart symbol when I select an album, then select an individual photo and then click it again for lightbox view. So visitors can not see heart symbol to click when they see thumbnails on any albums.
Could you please let me know how I can see "Show ratings" option in settings; how I can show times rated under/on each photos.
Thanks and regards, Ercan

item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: For Google Analytics to work smoothly with my website what do I need to setup? Tracking ID? What is this ID?

item.title: Rate-Plungin - how to reset the counter for one or all images
item.description: I just bought the rate Plugin. Now I'm wondering how to reset the count for one individual image and how to rest it for all images? Thank you for your support. Kind Regards, Holger

item.title: Why is the Image Protector Plugin so limited in it's functions?
item.description:
Hi
Considering to buy more plugins to enhance site for more interaction. However, there is one matter that bothers me a lot of its restrictions. Actually, I have asked this questions already over a year ago, and not much has happened since then. As well I noticed of other koken users pinpointing to the same matter. For example, other photography cms solution e.g. Photoshelter, ProPhoto etc - make this option possible ...
Why is it not possible to exclude watermarks of specific images for promotion purposes on SoMe? It would be great to exclude the generation of image watermarks on specific images, e.g. splash images. This could be based on tags or on a new property for image file ("Do not watermark").
Looking forward for feedback. Thanks

item.title: Instagram plug-in not working
item.description:
Hi - Just purchased the Instagram plug-in and installed and set it up. But just hangs when I try to import images from my account.
Another odd thing is under Settings/Plug-Ins/Instagram Set-up I see that (after I connected to my Instagram act) there is no Disconnect button. Nothing in the space where, I believe, it should be.
Checked my Instagram act on their site and it does list Koken as an authorized application.
Also I have a SSL site. Could that be causing the problem?

item.title: image-protector: partial access
item.description:
Hello there,
Recently, I bought the image-protector plugin. Is it possible to set it such that when a photo is shared to twitter (for example like https://twitter.com/chitlesh/status/828727984353845248) or facebook, a small version of the photo is shared instead of only the link without image? I still wish to that the right-click protection together with the protection for large files.
regards, Chitlesh

item.title: Text Option for Slideshows?
item.description:
Hello,
thank you for Koken!
Is there an option in Axis (or any theme) to show an image caption or free text in the slideshows on the starting page?
Thank you!

item.title: Add to Cart Plugin
item.description:
Hello Guys,
Wanted to ask if I can use Cart Plug to sell not only prints and photos, but also video products or lets say I create a Christmas Promotion Deal/Offer. I attach a photo with a text explaining my offering. Is it possible with this Card Plugin to sell things/products/photography services online? Or alternatively people to book me for a photo shoot and pay a 30% deposit in advance?
I attached a photo to better illustrate my point. Download link: https://we.tl/2EKkuyeT4v
Best, Plamen

item.title: LR-Plugin - Create Album & Sets in Private or Unlisted possible?
item.description: Is it possible with the LR plugin next to the public folder to upload albums and sets in Unlisted and private?

item.title: Trouble with VIMEO-Playback
item.description:
Hi,
I have some trouble with my Koken-built-website playing videos. I am using the VIMEO-plugin and MADISON 2 theme. Some videos have an "audio echo" and pressing the "pause" button in the player window makes the video stop, but the audio ist playing on. It seems there are playing two audio tracks with delay but there is only one in the video.
I am using:
MAC OS 10.11.6 SAFARI 10.0.3
Autoplay - ON Show Title ON - does not work also...
Can you help me, please?
Video-URL is: http://jostfink.de/newsite/beta/albums/film-video/content/fill-in-and-drink-out-1/
Thanks...

item.title: Password protect plugin is broken
item.description:
Hello,
Ever since I used the Lightroom plugin to update a password protected album, all password protected albums won't open. Even though I use the correct password, the login page tells me it's incorrect. I tried changing it in the admin panel to no avail.

item.title: Cart / multiple items
item.description: I've just installed Cart, set up Stripe, made a few custom items to order and seem to have it working ok. What I can't see is how people add multiple images to the cart before paying. I have an event page with 300 images, some people will want to select 4 or 5 images then check out. It looks to me like they have to go through the purchase procedure for each item - am I missing something?

item.title: Lightroom Sync-Error
item.description:
Hello,
I'm using Koken since 2 years. Now I want creat a new Album on my homepage, after a new install of my computer. During upload i get a Error-Message like: "Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten: AgExportSession:recodRemoteCollectionId: remote ID must be a number or string"
I know this problem has other user befor. You answer is that i should make all from Lightroom. But you say not how i fix this problem. Should i delete my hole homepage an make new? Or is there a other way?
Kind regards Dirk Schatz

item.title: How does api filter works?
item.description:
I want to build a plugin that would alter koken:img output and add data-id="{{ content.id }} to it. But there are no examples available in your documentation, and search results return endless API CONNECTION errors topics...
How would I do that? Could you at least point me in the right direction?

item.title: Chart instant download dosen't work
item.description: Hey Been having issues with chart plugin, it dosen't send the image to be instantly downloaded in browser? It worked fine until last update. Tried to reinstall the plugin without success, any ideas or help would be appreciated.

item.title: Lightroom implementation
item.description: Hy there, sorry to bother you again. Sadly there's another question i would like to ask... i got erveral albums i did within lightroom to be synchronized with koken. Now i set up some smartalbums for special interests. Putting in pictures from existin albums and such wich have not been published before, i synchronised it ant thought that the pictures allready in other albums would just be linked in but unfortunately i find several different versions in my library right now. wich means when i alter the picture i have two different looking versions in koken.... is that ment to be like this or did i do something wrong?

item.title: Can't install new plagins

item.title: Koken Rating and Image Protector don't work together
item.description:
Hi, i have purchased the rating plugin and it works fine. After that i have purchased the image protector plugin, the protection of images works fine, but image protector overlay protects also the rating plugin heart. So its impossible to rate a photo because users can't click the little heart.
Need help!
Thanks in advanced & regards
